name: After Contact
blurb: This entry for the LA Film Prize tells the story of a young man who is thrown into an event that will alter the planet and himself.

name: "Frontier" Short Film
blurb: Welcome to the small town of Frontier, Maine. If you see something, say nothing.

name: Imperial Nova II: The Dogs of War
blurb: Filming the cinematic trailer and prologue for the upcoming novel: Imperial Nova II: The Dogs of War by Rory Joscelyne!

name: Other Versions of You
blurb: After the girl he loves gets married, a man explores parallel universes to find another version of this girl who will love him back.

name: White Armour - A Star Wars Fan Film
blurb: A short film following a Stormtrooper recon unit set in the Star Wars Universe

name: Wasp-Men From Mars!
blurb: For Suzie, James, and Timmy, it’s the end of the world. And that’s BEFORE aliens invade Earth.

name: Sci-Fi: The Quantified Self - A Family of Self Trackers
blurb: With the help of Fandor.com, we are developing a sci-fi short about a family of self-trackers who take it to the next level.

name: Pacific 201
blurb: Pacific 201 is a fan-made, feature-length production that details events between "Star Trek: Enterprise" and The Original Series.

name: Kosmos - Create A Scifi Show!
blurb: A gripping scifi mystery thriller from the maker of Third Contact.

name: Personal Space: A Science Fiction Webseries
blurb: Astronauts aboard a generation ship have no idea their therapy sessions are broadcast on Earth as reality TV.

name: SOLO - Sci-fi film
blurb: Psychological Sci-fi Short film. Get your name on IMDB

name: Athena Finishing Fund
blurb: Help get the latest Sci-Fi/Action short from award-winning writer/director Andrew Kadikian out of post and onto your computer screen!

name: SKYWATCH: a sci-fi short
blurb: When two teenagers hack into a drone delivery system,  they soon find themselves targeted - and scrambling to cover their tracks.

name: Eternal
blurb: Eternal is an ambitious Star Wars fanfilm project based in Bristol and run by students passionate about Star Wars and Film-Making.

name: SHORT FILM - At the End's Edge
blurb: At the End's Edge will be a two-part film series based on the same-titled YA Novel written by me (pen Rhoda Riley)!

name: MAX RELOAD and The Nether Blasters
blurb: A feature film about a small town video game store clerk who accidentally unleashes the forces of evil from a cursed ColecoVision game.

name: Slice of Life - original short film homage to 80's SCI-FI
blurb: Slice of Life is a love letter to the Science Fiction genre of the 80's, entirely made with practical effects and miniatures!

name: Jesus Shows You the Way to the Highway
blurb: A new Afrofuturist Sci-Fi! A WTF thriller! A final punch against global corruption! An underground James Bond! Far beyond The Matrix!

name: Help us make REGEN - a scifi short film.
blurb: REGEN: one of a series of short science fiction films.

name: Lost Skeleton Returns Again 10th Anniversary Blu-Ray
blurb: Larry Blamire's first ever Blu-Ray will be jam packed with new features including 2 new short films, behind the scenes, and more

name: MICROWAVE: a coming-of-age science-fiction feature
blurb: A story about friendship, growing up, and breaking the fourth dimension.

name: BLOOD MACHINES : The Last Campaign
blurb:
A space opera by SETH ICKERMAN with the music of CARPENTER BRUT. 
A female ghost challenges two space hunters into a galactic chase.

name: The Traveler - Sci-Fi Short
blurb: Everything Changes for young Odin Scott when he encounters a mysterious Traveler and is reluctantly thrust into a dangerous quest.

name: Sight: Extended
blurb: A visually stunning, dark, futuristic thriller. The full length realization of the critically acclaimed short film Sight.

name: Caretakers | Short Film
blurb: With the help of an experimental tech program, an overworked single mother uses an artificial intelligence clone to help raise her son.

name: Uus Elu 451
blurb: A 5 episode short film series in a sci-fi environment for children and youths.

name: The Companion: A New Home for Sci-Fi
blurb: Part magazine, Part 'making of' companion, Part DVD extras - from the team behind Stargate Command

name: ISOLATION - A Short Film
blurb: Ava is released from a year of isolation and suspicious occurrences make her feel that she does not belong.

name: ORION
blurb:
A sci-fi feature film inspired by 80s blockbusters
|
Un largometraje de ciencia ficción inspirado en el cine blockbuster de los 80s

name: The Lost Skeleton of Cadavra Limited Edition Lunch Box
blurb: Accessing modern lunch box science & a lot of art related stuff, the world will finally have something better than the internet!

name: ALUS | an original short film
blurb: What if Siri had a dark side? A sci-fi horror short film you'll never forget.

name: Prehistoric Eclipse - A Giant Cavewoman Monster Movie
blurb: A giantess monster movie inspired by classics like King Kong and One Million Years BC

name: The Robosexual - A Queer Sci-Fi Film
blurb: A sci-fi film inspired by LGBTQ history where attraction to androids is a sickness and a crime.

name: Forsaken Mercenary: A Sci-Fi Thriller Short Film
blurb: He's the deadliest man in the galaxy with a secret that could be his undoing.
